happy.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
happy.author: Confucius

happy.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
happy.author: Anne Frank

happy.quote: When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down ‘happy’. They told me I didn’t understand the assignment, and I told them they didn’t understand life.
happy.author: John Lennon

happy.quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
happy.author: Unknown

happy.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
happy.author: Steve Jobs

happy.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
happy.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

happy.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
happy.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

happy.quote: It is not how old you are, but how you are old.
happy.author: Jules Renard

happy.quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new.
happy.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

happy.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
happy.author: Dalai Lama

happy.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life — to be happy — it’s all that matters.
happy.author: Audrey Hepburn

happy.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
happy.author: Albert Schweitzer

happy.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
happy.author: Peter Drucker

happy.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
happy.author: Confucius

sad.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
sad.author: Alice Walker

sad.quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
sad.author: Aristotle

sad.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
sad.author: Plato

sad.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
sad.author: George Addair

sad.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
sad.author: Buddha

sad.quote: Tears are words that need to be written.
sad.author: Paulo Coelho

sad.quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
sad.author: Rumi

sad.quote: It's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
sad.author: Abraham Lincoln

sad.quote: The longer I live, the more I realize the impact of attitude on life. Attitude, to me, is more important than facts...
sad.author: Charles R. Swindoll

sad.quote: A good cry is as cleansing as the rain.
sad.author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

sad.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
sad.author: David Viscott

sad.quote: A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the time comes.
sad.author: J.S.B. Morse

sad.quote: Life is too important to be taken seriously.
sad.author: Oscar Wilde

sad.quote: You don’t know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
sad.author: Bob Marley

motivation.quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
motivation.author: Kevin Kruse

motivation.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
motivation.author: Napoleon Hill

motivation.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
motivation.author: Robert Frost

motivation.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
motivation.author: Wayne Gretzky

motivation.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
motivation.author: Chinese Proverb

motivation.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivation.quote: We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
motivation.author: Marie Curie

motivation.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
motivation.author: Norman Vaughan

motivation.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
motivation.author: Lao Tzu

motivation.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivation.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
motivation.author: William James

motivation.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivation.author: Sam Levenson

motivation.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
motivation.author: Walt Disney

motivation.quote: Don’t wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
motivation.author: Henry David Thoreau

motivation.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
motivation.author: Nelson Mandela

motivation.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
motivation.author: Christian D. Larson
